question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Struct: OwnerConfiguration] [Stake Amount Manipulation] Can stake_amount (line 356) in OwnerConfiguration be set differently than in ValidatorConfiguration, creating inconsistent stake accounting across validator roles? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Struct: OwnerConfiguration] [Commission Percentage Mismatch] Can commission_percentage (line 357) differ between OwnerConfiguration and ValidatorConfiguration, causing confusion about actual commission rates and reward distribution? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Struct: OperatorConfiguration] [Consensus Key Without PoP] Does OperatorConfiguration (line 365) enforce that consensus_proof_of_possession must be valid for the provided consensus_public_key, or can mismatched pairs be supplied? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Struct: OperatorConfiguration] [Network Key Reuse] Can validator_network_public_key (line 367) be reused across multiple validators in OperatorConfiguration, enabling network identity confusion and Sybil attacks? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Struct: OperatorConfiguration] [Full Node Optional Fields] Can full_node_network_public_key (line 369) be None while full_node_host (line 370) is Some, creating incomplete network configurations that fail during operation? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Struct: StringOwnerConfiguration] [String Injection] Can StringOwnerConfiguration (lines 374-384) accept strings with special characters or SQL injection patterns that later corrupt database storage or parsing? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Struct: StringOperatorConfiguration] [Public Key Format Attack] Can consensus_public_key (line 390) as Option<String> in StringOperatorConfiguration contain malformed hex strings that parse successfully but represent invalid BLS keys? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for AccountBalanceMap] [Duplicate Account Detection] Does the duplicate check (lines 441-446) in try_from() properly use HashSet to detect all duplicates, or can hash collisions allow duplicate accounts to slip through? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for AccountBalanceMap] [Balance Overflow] Can individual balance values cause overflow when summed across all accounts, exceeding total_supply and enabling hidden token minting? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for Vec<AccountBalance>] [Duplicate Detection in Reverse] Does the reverse conversion (lines 464-500) at lines 477-482 properly prevent duplicates, or can the same account appear multiple times in balance_map.account_balances? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: deserialize() for AccountBalanceMap] [Deserialization Type Confusion] Can the deserialize implementation (lines 412-429) be exploited with malformed YAML/JSON to bypass AccountAddressWithChecks validation and inject invalid addresses? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for AccountBalanceMap] [Empty Balance Entry] Does try_from() handle empty BTreeMap entries in account_balances, or can empty entries cause panics or incorrect balance initialization? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for Vec<AccountBalance>] [Multiple Entries Per Map] Can balance_entry.iter().next() at lines 472-475 silently ignore additional entries beyond the first, allowing balance specification inconsistencies? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Struct: AccountBalanceMap] [Balance Underflow] Can balance values be set to 0 or negative (if deserialization allows), causing underflow when fees are deducted or creating accounts with invalid states? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for AccountBalanceMap] [Error Collection Race] Are the errors collected at line 437 and checked at line 451 thread-safe, or can concurrent genesis processing corrupt the error list? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for Vec<EmployeePool>] [Duplicate Employee Detection] Does the employee_accounts HashSet check (lines 533-547) prevent the same employee from appearing in multiple pools, or can they receive double vesting allocations? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for Vec<EmployeePool>] [Vesting Denominator Zero] Can vesting_schedule_denominator (line 567-572) be set to 0, causing division by zero errors in vesting calculations and locking all employee funds permanently? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for Vec<EmployeePool>] [Numerator Overflow] Can the sum of vesting_schedule_numerators (lines 559-565) exceed u64::MAX when accumulated, causing overflow and incorrect vesting percentage calculations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for Vec<EmployeePool>] [Vesting Schedule Mismatch] Does the validation (lines 550-558) properly enforce that all employee pools have identical vesting schedules, or can inconsistencies corrupt vesting contract state? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for Vec<EmployeePool>] [Numerator-Denominator Validation] Can numerators sum exactly to denominator, or does the modulo check (line 581-583) incorrectly reject valid configurations where last_numerator doesn't divide evenly? [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for Vec<EmployeePool>] [Commission Cap Bypass] Can the commission_percentage check (lines 592-598) be bypassed by setting exactly 50%, and should the cap be strictly less than 50%? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for Vec<EmployeePool>] [Genesis Join Incomplete Validation] Does the join_during_genesis validation (lines 601-624) check all required fields, or can a validator join with missing full_node_host but present full_node_network_public_key? [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for Vec<EmployeePool>] [Stake Amount Threshold] Is the hardcoded stake check at line 617 (< 100000000000000) vulnerable to configuration drift, and can it be bypassed by setting stake_amount to exactly the threshold? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for Vec<EmployeePool>] [Beneficiary Resetter Consistency] Does the beneficiary_resetter validation (lines 626-638) ensure all pools share the same resetter, or can the first pool set a malicious resetter that later pools must match? [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-genesis/src/config.rs] [Function: try_from() for Vec<EmployeePool>] [Error Accumulation Attack] Can an attacker craft inputs that generate thousands of error messages (collected at line 535), causing memory exhaustion during genesis validation? (Medium)
